scripts.prepare: ./node_modules/.bin/gulp default && cd ./dist && ../node_modules/.bin/phonegap plugin add cordova-plugin-crosswalk-webview && ../node_modules/.bin/phonegap plugin add https://github.com/Wizcorp/phonegap-facebook-plugin/ --variable APP_ID='--FBID--' --variable APP_NAME='flapatspace' && cd ..
